column3: Social;Pailin (Kosantepheap): Preliminary reports say that four construction workers were killed and one seriously injured after an elevatorÂ ------broke on the 7th floor of a building under construction.------The incident happened at 7:30 am on September 4
column4: located at the point of National Road 57 in Phsar Prum village
column7: Pailin Province.------Witnesses suggest the cable holding the elevator car snapped
column8: causing the accident.------The injured man has been taken to hospital in Battambang.------More images:------https://tvfb.news/article/13910------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/697829.html
